result.script:
function defaultTodoLine() { return { template : '
' + ' ' + '

{{caption}}

' + ' ' + ' ' + '
${State} {{state}}
' + ' ' + ' ' + ' ${Completed} ' + ' ' + ' ' + ' ${Completed by } {{completedBy}} ' + ' ' + ' ' + ' ${Created} ' + ' ' + ' ' + '
{{linkCaption}}
' + ' ' + '
', restrict : 'E', replace : true, scope : { timestamp : "=", completedBy : "@", created : "@", caption : "@", state: "@", link : "@", linkCaption : "@", tagId : "@" }, link : function(scope) { if(!scope.tagId) scope.tagId = 'task-completed'; } }; }
